name: Jetpacking
description:
Just another day jetpacking. Right?

Fullscreen, headphones and downloading highly recommended for the best experience!

Controls:

Left mouse button to thrust towards the mouse cursor

Middle mouse button to self-destruct

Tip: Touching the bottom of the screen reduces your fire rate!

Made in 7 days for the Mouse Jam 2

Focus: Mouse only!

Theme: Chase

I made all of the art, sounds, music, etc.
